oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Published for the Imami Ismaili School.
Soft covers, binding and paper in good condition. Several pages torn and in poor condition.
Each book includes index and glossary of significant ginanic terminology.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.

Contains: Pañdhar:ginānnī:ćopaḍī / Pīr Ǵulām ʻAlī Shāh, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Shams, ... [et al.] (1903) ; Vīs:ginānnī:ćopaḍī / Pīr Imām Shāh, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Sayyid Khān, ... [et al.] (1904) ; Paćīs:ginānnī:ćopaḍī / Pīr Shams, Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn, ... [et al.] (1904).
